summary: A story about four brothers from a poor family who need to fight to follow their dreams.
cast: Sandra Corveloni|João Baldasserini|Vinícius de Oliveira|Geraldo Rodrigues|Kaique Jesus Santos|Roberto Audi|Denise Weinberg|Ana Luiza Garritano|Sérgio Mastropasqua|Renata Novaes|Mário César Camargo|Gabriela Rabello|Rafael Losso|Almir Barros|Luis Serra|Zeca Auricchio|Norival Rizzo|Murilo Grossi|Luisa Micheletti|Mateus Solano|Beatriz Seigner|Aldo Bueno|Rubens Ferreira|Ana Alves|Douglas Rosa|Marianna Armellini|Mauro Persil|Maicon Soares|Acauã Sol|Marcio Pial|Wellington Dias dos Santos|José Trassi|Bryan Ruffo|Maurício de Barros|Celso Silva Dos Santos|Fernando Barros|Éder Luís|Marcello Airoldi|Herculano Almeida|Fernando Bezerra|Maria Paula Brandao|Lilih Curi|Ana Carolina Dias|Maurilio Domiciano|Daniela Galli|Mariza Matos|Patricia Pichamone|Luis Xavier
title: Linha de Passe
